category.name: wcf.acp.cache
category.item: The cache has been successfully emptied.
Are you sure that you want to empty the cache completely?

category.name: wcf.acp.cronjob
category.item: Day of the month (1 - 31), the cron job should be executed.
Weekday (0 - 6 with Sunday = 0, or mon - sun), the cron job should be executed.
Hours (0 - 23), the cron job should be executed.
Minutes (0 - 59), the cron job should be executed.
Month (1 - 12, or jan - dec), the cron job should be executed.

Configuring cron jobs (automatized scheduled tasks) requires distinct knowledge of the crontab syntax on Unix based systems. More information about this topic can be obtained on the following Webpage: Newbie: Intro to cron.
There is no class with the given name.
The timings you have set are invalid.
Are you sure that you want to remove the cron job “{$cronjob->description|truncate:50:' ...'}”?
Are you sure that you want to remove all log entries?

category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: Are you sure you would like to remove the user group “{$group->groupName}”?
You are currently a member of this user group! Changing the permissions of this user group could result in locking yourself out of the Administration Control Panel. Please be careful!
Enter a name for this group.
Show the members of this user group
Allows members of this user group to enter the Administration Control Panel and, dependent upon their permissions, run certain actions.
Can delete log of executed cron jobs
Members of this user group have access to the following groups. For example, you may set if the user group has permission to edit themselves.
If the option for “Accessible User groups” has been enabled, then on creation of the user, the appropriate accessible user groups can also be assigned.

category.name: wcf.acp.masterPassword
category.item: This page or action requires you to enter the master password due to security reasons. You only need to do so once for a session. If you have forgotten the master password you can reset it by deleting the file {@RELATIVE_WCF_DIR}acp/masterPassword.inc.php.
The master password is not correct. If you have forgotten the master password you can reset it by deleting the file {@RELATIVE_WCF_DIR}acp/masterPassword.inc.php.
The entered passwords are not identical.

The password is not secure. It has to contain at least eight characters, small and capital latin letters as well as numbers and special characters. It must not be identically with passwords of other administrators of this page.

The master password is an additional protection for functions that are relevant to security. You should use a very secure password that must not be identically with your normal administrator password, unknown to others and not be used on other websites.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Enter one IP address each row.
Enter one user agent each row.
You can enter one server each row.
Some of the types have special requirements to the server system and cannot be used in any environment.
Memcache stores data in the memory that is often accessed. This may reduce the database load dramatically. Read more about the memcache on the following site: memcached.org.
You can configure optional proxy servers for connections to external servers.
This is optional, so in most cases you don't need to specify the cookie domain.
The cookie path is concurrent to the document root of your site - e.g. “/forum” for http://www.woltlab.com/forum.
Download the exported options as a backup file to your local machine.
Enable this option to send content from the server to clients in a compressed form. This option reduces traffic.
Disable caching of pages in browsers
A value of 1 to 9 is required. As an optimum between compression and server performance, we recommend a value of 1.
The import of the options file has failed.
The options have been successfully imported.
Upload the options to be imported from your local machine.
Path to the debug log file
Enter the sender's e-mail address that should be used for automated e-mails.
Enter the sender's name that should be used for automated e-mails.
Enter a signature that should be sent with system e-mails.
Some servers may require the “-f” parameter to be used when sending e-mails. If your users experience problems with receiving e-mails, try enabling this option.
Sender's and receiver's addresses are formatted in “Name <email@domain.tld>”. This option is not supported by all mail servers and should be turned off in case of any problems.
Pages and forms in the admin control panel that are relevant to security can be protected with an additional master password.
That title will show up inside the page header, if you have enabled it with the style editor.
Enter the time a session should remain valid [seconds].
Should the IP address be checked while reading the session data?
Show current time in page footer
Choose the default time zone for your site.
Enter the time users should remain marked as online when they are inactive [seconds].

category.name: wcf.acp.package
category.item: Packages dependent on this package to work
Packages required for this package to work
The given archive is no valid package.
The tables above will be overwritten once you continue the installation process. All data contained in these tables will be lost.
The tables above will be removed once you continue the installation process. All data contained in these tables will be lost.
This package is already installed and can't be installed multiple times.
The given directory already contains an application.
Enter a direct path to the package file here. An internet address can be used or alternatively the path to the package file using the server's file system.
Enter the package file to be uploaded from your computer here.
Do you really want to uninstall the package “{@$package->getName()}”?

category.name: wcf.acp.user
category.item: Assign the following users to the selected group(s)
Are you sure that you would like to delete the user “{$user->username}”?
You are currently editing your own user account. Changing the permissions of this user group might lead to locking yourself out of the Administration Control Panel. Please be careful!
Export the e-mail addresses of the following users
Find users that are not members of the chosen user groups.
The chosen action has been successfully executed on {#$affectedUsers} users.

The bulk processor will perform the following tasks without additional security notification on all users matching the set conditions. Bulk processing can be very performance intensive, so it should only be executed while the forum is being set to offline. To have a correct display of your content you should update the counters afterwards. The processing can not be reversed, so please be attentive when using this function.
No users have been found for the given search criteria.

Enter the sender's e-mail address in the following format:

{if MAIL_USE_FORMATTED_ADDRESS}Senders name <email@sender.tld>{else}email@sender.tld{/if}

If you have completely filled in the section under System -> Options -> General -> E-mails, then this field will automatically be filled in. If you are sending e-mails using SMTP, then the sender's e-mail address must also be accepted by the server.
Send an e-mail to the members of the following user groups:
Send an e-mail to the following users

category.name: wcf.date
category.item: {if $years}{if $years > 1}{#$years} years{else}A year{/if}{/if}{if $months}{if $firstElement != 'months'}{if $firstElement != 'months'}{if $lastElement == 'months'} and {else}, {/if}{/if}{#$months} months{else}{if $firstElement == 'months'}A{else}a{/if} month{/if}{/if}{if $weeks}{if $firstElement != 'weeks'}{if $lastElement == 'weeks'} and {else}, {/if}{/if}{if $weeks > 1}{#$weeks} weeks{else}{if $firstElement == 'weeks'}A{else}a{/if} week{/if}{/if}{if $days}{if $firstElement != 'days'}{if $lastElement == 'days'} and {else}, {/if}{/if}{if $days > 1}{#$days} days{else}{if $firstElement == 'days'}A{else}a{/if} day{/if}{/if}{if $hours}{if $firstElement != 'hours'}{if $lastElement == 'hours'} and {else}, {/if}{/if}{if $hours > 1}{#$hours} hours{else}{if $firstElement == 'hours'}An{else}an{/if} hour{/if}{/if}{if $minutes}{if $firstElement != 'minutes' && $lastElement == 'minutes'} and {/if}{if $minutes > 1}{#$minutes} minutes{else}{if $firstElement == 'minutes'}A{else}a{/if} minute{/if}{/if} ago
(UTC-04:00) Georgetown, La Paz, Manaus, San Juan
(UTC-02:00) South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

(UTC+02:00) Helsinki, Kiev, Riga, Sofia, Tallinn, Vilnius
